Go here :

http://www.forzespeciali.it/indexg.html

You'll be able to buy the T-shirt.

-----Messaggio originale-----
Da: steve [mailto:graphicsguy5291@...]
Inviato: venerdì 15 agosto 2003 5.34
A: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Oggetto: [samuraihistory] photos

Hi:

I hope someone here can help me. I am looking for photos of WW II
Kamikaze pilots wearing the Kamikaze headband. Can anyone help me?




Samurai Archives: http://www.samurai-archives.com
